publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2655 Tommy Sheridan: Representation on the European Union Convention on the Future of Europe—That the Parliament notes with regret that Scotland will have no representation at the European Union Convention on the Future of Europe and calls on the Scottish Executive to make representations to Her Majesty’s Government and the European Union to secure direct representation on the convention.
S1M-2655 Representation on the European Union Convention on the Future of Europe (lodged on 29 January 2002) Stewart Stevenson*

S1M-2655 Tommy Sheridan: Representation on the European Union Convention on the Future of Europe-That the Parliament notes with regret that Scotland will have no representation at the European Union Convention on the Future of Europe and calls on the Scottish Executive to make representations to Her Majesty's Government and the European Union to secure direct representation on the convention. Supported by: Stewart Stevenson, Dorothy-Grace Elder*
S1M-2655 Representation on the European Union Convention on the Future of Europe (lodged on 29 January 2002) Richard Lochhead*
S1M-2655 Representation on the European Union Convention on the Future of Europe (lodged on 29 January 2002) Shona Robison*
S1M-2655 Representation on the European Union Convention on the Future of Europe (lodged on 29 January 2002) Mr Duncan Hamilton*
S1M-2655 Representation on the European Union Convention on the Future of Europe (lodged on 29 January 2002) Linda Fabiani*
